snippet: The Columbus Blue Jackets are the hottest team in the NHL, and now they get a chance to step atop the league's most competitive division....
lead_paragraph: The Columbus Blue Jackets are the hottest team in the NHL, and now they get a chance to step atop the league's most competitive division.

headline.main: Atkinson, Blue Jackets Win Franchise-Record 10th Straight
headline.print_headline: Atkinson, Blue Jackets Win Franchise-Record 10th Straight
